name: js-meta-frameworks
description: 1. Research the web (and/or use [the resources](#resources)) to compile a list in a notepad doc or similar of at least five JS Meta-Frameworks including     - Main features and "selling points"     - How popular it is (stars on GitHub, community size, active development/releases etc.)     - What JS framework or technology is being used 2. Choose *at least one* meta-framework, and use their "Getting started" guide to display the compiled list in 1. Either pick one [by random](TODO: Insert random thing) or weigh your options against one another using your list. TODO: 3. (If server-side rendered) Hydration
